prompts.label: banner
prompts.text: A wide horizontal flat-lay composition featuring an elegant assortment of gift items representing Black-owned businesses: skincare bottles with golden serums, athletic wear in vibrant colors, wellness supplements in modern packaging, and stationery items with mindful designs. The scene includes floating sparkles and decorative elements around the gifts, arranged in a balanced cluster with plenty of negative space. Dimension ratio 16:9, size 1200px wide. Modern flat illustration with soft 3D-style characters and objects, combined with subtle 2D decorative elements. Use warm, vibrant pastels (teal #00A99D, coral-orange #FF6B35, sunshine yellow #FFD700). Layout must be clean and giftable, using rounded forms, balanced negative space, and minimal visual clutter. The tone should feel cheerful, light, editorial, and creative — never realistic or photorealistic. Use text only in social images. Background colors can vary within our color palette.

prompts.label: social
prompts.text: A square composition centered around a beautiful gift box overflowing with diverse products from Black-owned businesses: skincare items, athletic wear, wellness supplements, and stationery. The title '25 Amazing Gifts from Black-Owned Businesses Under $75' appears in elegant typography above the gift box. Floating sparkles and decorative swirls surround the scene, with a clean background that emphasizes the giftable nature of the items. Dimension ratio 1:1, size 1200x1200. Modern flat illustration with soft 3D-style characters and objects, combined with subtle 2D decorative elements. Use warm, vibrant pastels (teal #00A99D, coral-orange #FF6B35, sunshine yellow #FFD700). Layout must be clean and giftable, using rounded forms, balanced negative space, and minimal visual clutter. The tone should feel cheerful, light, editorial, and creative — never realistic or photorealistic. Use text only in social images. Background colors can vary within our color palette.

prompts.label: og
prompts.text: A horizontal flat-lay scene showcasing a curated collection of premium gift items from Black-owned businesses: elegant skincare bottles with golden serums, stylish athletic wear in bold colors, wellness supplements in modern containers, and beautiful stationery with inclusive designs. The items are arranged in a sophisticated cluster with floating decorative elements and sparkles, emphasizing the quality and diversity of the products. Dimension ratio 16:9, size 1200px wide. Modern flat illustration with soft 3D-style characters and objects, combined with subtle 2D decorative elements. Use warm, vibrant pastels (teal #00A99D, coral-orange #FF6B35, sunshine yellow #FFD700). Layout must be clean and giftable, using rounded forms, balanced negative space, and minimal visual clutter. The tone should feel cheerful, light, editorial, and creative — never realistic or photorealistic. Use text only in social images. Background colors can vary within our color palette.
